title: Can ChatGPT Pass An Introductory Level Functional Language Programming Course?. (arXiv:2305.02230v1 [cs.CY])
abstract: The recent introduction of ChatGPT has drawn significant attention from both industry and academia due to its impressive capabilities in solving a diverse range of tasks, including language translation, text summarization, and computer programming. Its capability for writing, modifying, and even correcting code together with its ease of use and access is already dramatically impacting computer science education. This paper aims to explore how well ChatGPT can perform in an introductory-level functional language programming course. translated_title: ChatGPT能通过入门级函数式语言编程课程吗？
translated_abstract: ChatGPT的引入引起了工业界和学术界的广泛关注，因为它在解决各种任务，包括语言翻译、文本摘要和计算机编程方面具有卓越的能力。它编写、修改甚至纠正代码的能力加上其易于使用和访问已经对计算机科学教育产生了巨大影响。本文旨在探讨ChatGPT在入门级函数式语言编程课程中的表现。在我们的系统评估中，我们把ChatGPT视为我们的一名学生，并证明它可以获得B-的成绩，排名在314名学生中的第155位。我们的综合评估从学生和讲师的角度提供了有价值的见解。此外，我们还确定了ChatGPT可以为这两个群体提供的几个潜在好处。总体而言，我们认为本研究明确了ChatGPT在计算机科学教育中的应用价值。
tldr: 本研究测试了ChatGPT在入门级函数式语言编程课程中的表现，结果显示它可以获得B-的成绩并且能够给学生和讲师带来潜在好处。
en_tdlr: This study examines the performance of ChatGPT in an introductory-level functional language programming course and finds that it can achieve a grade of B- and potentially offer benefits to both students and instructors.
